name: Stranger Dasher
description:
You are the Dashman, a cool (but highly weird) speedster alien whose main purpose in life is going fast. Free the world from the evil space robots that torment the Dasman tribe in this short (but higly cool) action platformer. Dash away and never look back!

Stranger Dasher is a short prototype (8 levels) focused on testing the viability of a game based solely in the dash movement. We recommend dowloading the game for a better experience, although the game is fully playable on browser. Hope you enjoy it and please, do not hesitate on leaving some feedback on the comments!

Stranger Dasher can be played with Keyboard or Gamepad.

CONTROLS
AWSD / Arrow Keys / Left Gamepad Stick --> Movement
Space Bar / (B) or Cross button (Gamepad) --> Dash
ESC --> Close the game

If you feel you need a little help, here is a cheat: press F2 in order to kill everything on sight. This may help you if you are stuck but still want to check the rest of the game.

Harbaill Works is
Carlos P. Sempere (@Celuloidedede) -> Game Desigh + Programming
Santiago Orozco (@Santiagu) -> 3D/2D Art + Animations
Raúl Ibarra (@Croasan) -> Main Animator

Special thanks to Laura Sirvent (@Lady_Caballo) for her much needed help with Art Direction.
